info.title: Grant (A2X)
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update, and delete the grant master data from SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. This service is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in SAP Fiori apps and other user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete grant master data synchronously using this inbound service

parameters.name: GrantID
parameters.description:
Grant  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: GrantLifecycleStatus
parameters.description:
Lifecycle Status  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET GrantBdgtValidityLink HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
